verses.verse: וַיַּ֗עַל <S%H5927><s%> came up נָחָשׁ֙ <S%H5176><s%> Then Nahash הָֽעַמּוֹנִ֔י <S%H5984><s%> the Ammonite וַיִּ֖חַן <S%H2583><s%> and encamped עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of יָבֵ֣שׁ <S%H3003><s%> of Jabesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <S%H559><s%> said כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> the men יָבֵישׁ֙ <S%H3003><s%> of Jabesh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָחָ֔שׁ <S%H5176><s%> unto Nahash כְּרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> Make לָ֥נוּ בְרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> with us and we will serve

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> But נָחָשׁ֙ <S%H5176><s%> And Nahash הָעַמּוֹנִ֔י <S%H5984><s%> the Ammonite בְּזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> them On this אֶכְרֹ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> [condition] will I make לָכֶ֔ם בִּנְק֥וֹר <S%H5365><s%> [a covenant] with you that I may thrust out לָכֶ֖ם כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> eyes יָמִ֑ין <S%H3225><s%> all your right וְשַׂמְתִּ֥יהָ <S%H7760><s%> and lay חֶרְפָּ֖ה <S%H2781><s%> it [for] a reproach עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> one יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> upon all Israel

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> And the elders יָבֵ֗ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> of Jabesh הֶ֤רֶף <S%H7503><s%> respite לָ֙נוּ֙ שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> unto him Give us seven יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days' וְנִשְׁלְחָה֙ <S%H7971><s%> that we may send מַלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> throughout גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> unto all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there מוֹשִׁ֛יעַ <S%H3467><s%> and then if [there be] no man to save אֹתָ֖נוּ <S%H853><s%> וְיָצָ֥אנוּ <S%H3318><s%> us we will come out אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> Then came הַמַּלְאָכִים֙ <S%H4397><s%> the messengers גִּבְעַ֣ת <S%H1390><s%> to Gibeah שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> and told הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> the tidings בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> in the ears הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וַיִּשְׂא֧וּ <S%H5375><s%> lifted up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קוֹלָ֖ם <S%H6963><s%> their voices וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> and wept

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> And behold Saul בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> after הַבָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> the herd מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> out of the field וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What לָּעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> What [aileth] the people כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יִבְכּ֑וּ <S%H1058><s%> that they weep וַיְסַ֨פְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> ? And they told ל֔וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> him the tidings אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> of the men יָבֵֽישׁ׃ <S%H3003><s%> of Jabesh

וַתִּצְלַ֤ח <S%H6743><s%> came רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> And the Spirit אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> upon Saul [בְּשָׁמְעֹו כ] (כְּשָׁמְעֹ֖ו <S%H8085><s%> listen ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> those tidings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיִּ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַפּ֖וֹ <S%H639><s%> and his anger מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> greatly

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> And he took צֶ֨מֶד <S%H6776><s%> a yoke בָּקָ֜ר <S%H1241><s%> of oxen וַֽיְנַתְּחֵ֗הוּ <S%H5408><s%> and hewed them in pieces וַיְשַׁלַּ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> and sent בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> throughout גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> [them] throughout all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> by the hands הַמַּלְאָכִ֣ים ׀ <S%H4397><s%> of messengers לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> Whoever אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <S%H369><s%> does not יֹצֵ֜א <S%H3318><s%> Whosoever cometh not forth אַחֲרֵ֤י <S%H310><s%> after שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְאַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> and after שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> so יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> so shall it be done לִבְקָר֑וֹ <S%H1241><s%> unto his oxen וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> fell פַּֽחַד־ <S%H6343><s%> And the fear יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> on the people וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> and they came out כְּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> consent אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> with one

וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> And when he numbered בְּבָ֑זֶק <S%H966><s%> them in Bezek וַיִּהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> were three מֵא֣וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said לַמַּלְאָכִ֣ים <S%H4397><s%> unto the messengers הַבָּאִ֗ים <S%H935><s%> that came כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תֹֽאמְרוּן֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus shall ye say לְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> unto the men יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> of Jabesh גִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead מָחָ֛ר <S%H4279><s%> To morrow תִּהְיֶֽה־ <S%H1961><s%> will have לָכֶ֥ם תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <S%H8668><s%> ye shall have help [בְּחֹם כ] (כְּחֹ֣ם <S%H2527><s%> heat ק) הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> by [that time] the sun וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> came הַמַּלְאָכִ֗ים <S%H4397><s%> And the messengers וַיַּגִּ֛ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and shewed לְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the men יָבֵ֖ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> of Jabesh וַיִּשְׂמָֽחוּ׃ <S%H8055><s%> and they were glad

וַֽיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> Therefore the men יָבֵ֔ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> of Jabesh מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> To morrow נֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> we will come out אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> unto you and ye shall do לָּ֔נוּ כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whatever הַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good בְּעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> with us all that seemeth ס

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <S%H4283><s%> And it was [so] on the morrow וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> put שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> that Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> the people שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> in three רָאשִׁים֒ <S%H7218><s%> companies וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> into the midst הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <S%H4264><s%> of the host בְּאַשְׁמֹ֣רֶת <S%H821><s%> watch הַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיַּכּ֥וּ <S%H5221><s%> and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֖וֹן <S%H5983><s%> the Ammonites עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until חֹ֣ם <S%H2527><s%> until the heat הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of the day וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become הַנִּשְׁאָרִים֙ <S%H7604><s%> and it came to pass that they which remained וַיָּפֻ֔צוּ <S%H6327><s%> were scattered וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no נִשְׁאֲרוּ־ <S%H7604><s%> of them were not left בָ֖ם שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> so that two יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And the people אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> unto Samuel מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who הָאֹמֵ֔ר <S%H559><s%> Who [is] he that said שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> Shall Saul יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reign עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> over תְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> over us? bring הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> the men וּנְמִיתֵֽם׃ <S%H4191><s%> that we may put them to death

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּמַ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> be put to death אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> There shall not a man בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for to day עָשָֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> hath wrought יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <S%H8668><s%> salvation בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> to the people לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנֵלְכָ֣ה <S%H1980><s%> go הַגִּלְגָּ֑ל <S%H1537><s%> to Gilgal וּנְחַדֵּ֥שׁ <S%H2318><s%> and renew שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <S%H4410><s%> the kingdom

וַיֵּלְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> went כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <S%H1537><s%> to Gilgal וַיַּמְלִכוּ֩ <S%H4427><s%> king שָׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> and there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> and there they made Saul לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> in Gilgal וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <S%H2076><s%> and there they sacrificed שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> There זְבָחִ֥ים <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיִּשְׂמַ֨ח <S%H8055><s%> rejoiced שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> and there שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> and there Saul וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> greatly פ
